name: Example Adventure
description: A classic escape-the-house adventure demonstrating core Realm Engine features including locked doors, containers, hidden items, and puzzle-solving.
author: Realm Engine Team
walkthrough: 1. Pick up the Rusty Key from the Front Porch
2. Unlock and open the Front Door
3. Go to the Kitchen and dig to find the Paper Note
4. Go to the Library and use the Paper Note to unlock the Treasure Chest
5. Take the Gold Coin from the chest
6. Exit through the Back Yard and Fence Gate to win
